alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 4:01PM MDT until July 18 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Phillips County in northeastern Montana... Northwestern Valley County in northeastern Montana... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 400 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles southeast of Dodson, or 14 miles southwest of Malta, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Malta, Whitewater, Saco, Sleeping Buffalo, Wagner, Frenchman Reservoir and Bowdoin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
